short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fixes a few minor annoyances in the AeroSoft portal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension fixes a few minor annoyances and adds small, useful features to the AeroSoft portal

Version 0.4
üêû Fixed bug where in some cases the auto-club-id feature was not working
üîß Changed internal project structure for better DX

Version 0.3
‚ú® Changed starting dat of the week to Monday
‚ú® Changed the design of the UTC time slot on hover

Version 0.2
‚ú® Added display how many flights you have scheduled in the "Next flights" tab
‚ú® Added display of time slot in UTC upon hover in "Next flights"

Version 0.1
‚ú® Added day of the week for the "next flights" table
‚ú® Added day of the week in the scheduler
‚ú® Added option to pre-fill the club ID upon login
